sentences.sentence: Pyroxenes and amphiboles also contain calcium.
Needle shape of the apatites and amphiboles in MMEs implying the process of fast cooling.
sentences.translation: 包体中发育针状磷灰石和角闪石，显示为岩浆淬冷的结果。

sentences.sentence: As Na-Ca sub-amphiboles appeared among the 52 samples, the method of estimating canon occupancied by X-ray diffraction is suitable to all amphiboles.
sentences.translation: 因52个样品中，也包含钠钙闪石亚族，故对整个闪石族用X射线衍射估算阳离子占位的问题已基本解决。
